lines.text: All you could think was if this was because of the message
All you could think was if Abronoma had something to do with this
She was rocking back and forth
I told you he would come to find me,
She danced her way out of the room
Maame grabbed your hand and dropped something into it
I have been keeping this for you
I wanted to give it to you on your wedding day
I left one like this for your sister
I left it for Baaba after I set the fire
and wondered how it had taken you so long,
that Maame was not a whole woman
Her spirit had been shattered a long time ago
No matter how much she loved you,
and no matter how much you loved her,
you both knew in that moment,
that no amount of love could return what Maame had lost
that Maame would rather die than run into the woods ever again,
even if it meant that you would inherit that unspeakable sense of loss,
and learn what it meant to be un-whole
Because I have already run once
Heavy footsteps are approaching the hut
just don't let it be yourself
Light floods the room as splinters fly past your head and the warriors enter
Afraid of what they might do,
You watch as one of the warriors approach Maame,
The other warrior grabs you by your arm
Once the warrior's knife has steadied in the air-
